name: Kimberly Crowe
offering: Affiliate Marketplace, Joint Venture Resources, Podcast Host, Public Speaking, Speaker Organizations, Webinar Training
what_you_do: Makes speaking on stages accessible and fun for entrepreneurs and coaches to share their message, with expertise in audience engagement and speak-to-sell.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs and coaches who want to share their message through speaking.
social_proof: Award-winning international inspirational public speaker, keynote speaker, TEDx speaker, authority on speak-to-sell, broadcast personality of Speakers Playhouse.
signature_programs: Speakers Playhouse, Entrepreneurs Rocket Fuel, Keynoting Kamp, Podapalooza, Influencers Cruise, Ten Simple Activities to Become a Recognized Speaker (free guide)
business_focus: Making speaking on stages accessible and fun for entrepreneurs and coaches through events, training, and community.
service_provided: Speaking events, gamified networking events (Speakers Playhouse), speaker training (Keynoting Kamp), podcast events (Podapalooza), networking cruise (Influencers Cruise), entrepreneur community
